name: Melody Unleashed
description:
Take the magic wand and use its musical powers. Listen to the note sequences, reproduce them with your piano keyboard and cast the spells to defeat strange little creatures, open doors, gates, activate platforms. Make your way  through the various dungeon rooms using your melodic skills and defeat the wicked final boss Clef.

Controls

A/D : Move left/right
W : Jump
E : Action / Interact
Buttons 1-7 : Play notes (keyboard default mode)
Left click : Play notes (mouse mode)                    Shoot
Right click : Cancel melody sequence
ESC : Open/Close Menu
